articles.title: Australia announces gun buyback plans less than a week after Bondi Beach shooting - CBS News
articles.description: Australia will use a sweeping buyback scheme to "get guns off our streets," Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said Friday.
articles.content: Sydney — Australia will use a sweeping buyback scheme to "get guns off our streets," Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said Friday, showing his government was keen to take quick action less than a week… [+7789 chars]
